```{r echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(here)
library(DT)
library(kableExtra)
library(widgetframe)
```

```{r echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE }
reading_list <- read_excel(here("content", "reading_list","reading_list.xlsx"))
```



```{r echo = FALSE}
list <- reading_list %>% DT::kable(reading_list)

widgetframe::frameWidget(list)
```
